name: iPatternTester
description:
iPatternTester v1.0 by Simon Wilson
===================================

Give your brain a workout by trying to recognise the next 6 colors for each new color sequence/level?

- Over 40 levels of increasing difficulty/complexity
- Easy to use/play interface, good for all ages
- No time constraints
- Challenge your friends/boss or family members to a timed match!
